Circuit Constructor (fd_greens.main.circuit_constructor)

class CircuitConstructor(ansatz: qiskit.circuit.quantumcircuit.QuantumCircuit, add_barriers: bool = True, anc: Sequence[int] = [0, 1])[source]

Bases: object

A class to construct circuits for calculating transition amplitudes in Green’s functions.

build_diagonal(a_op: qiskit.quantum_info.operators.symplectic.sparse_pauli_op.SparsePauliOp) → qiskit.circuit.quantumcircuit.QuantumCircuit[source]

Constructs the circuit to calculate a diagonal transition amplitude.

Parameters

circuit. (The creation/annihilation operator of the) –

Returns

The new circuit with the creation/annihilation operator added.

build_off_diagonal(a_op_m: qiskit.quantum_info.operators.symplectic.sparse_pauli_op.SparsePauliOp, a_op_n: qiskit.quantum_info.operators.symplectic.sparse_pauli_op.SparsePauliOp) → qiskit.circuit.quantumcircuit.QuantumCircuit[source]

Constructs the circuit to calculate off-diagonal transition amplitudes.

Parameters

  • a_op_m – The first operator in the circuit.

  • a_op_n – The second operator in the circuit.

Returns

The new circuit with the two operators appended.
